testsuite.test:
Verify Preconditions
Instructions: 1) Make sure all the preconditions listed are met. They will be required by upcoming tests. 2) Be sure the content of the testsuite's zip-file's folder 'test-audio' is available in the relative path 'test-audio'. 3) Ensure the volume is set to high, so you can hear the audio playing! 4) Click 'GO' to start testing.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

src is empty
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

currentSrc is empty
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

src set it and verify it ends in test audio loop wav
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

currentSrc ends in test audio loop wav
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
